input: Tesla's new battery technology promises longer range
validityText:
The input provided is "Tesla's new battery technology promises longer range". I will evaluate this according to the specifications:

2. The input should represent a news article or headline relevant to one of the categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. The topic of new battery technology by Tesla is relevant to the Sci/Tech category, as it deals with technological advancements.
3. The input should not be empty. The input is not empty.

All the requirements of the input specification are met. There are no violations in the provided input against the input specification.

OK
